## Time functions


```{r}
lubridate::ymd("20210906")
day(lubridate::ymd("20210906"))
days_in_month(ymd("20210901")) # I can do date-y things with it now
```


ISO 8601: "yyyy-mm-dd"

```{r}
dmy('16092021')
```



## Example: prison population

```{r}
prison = readr::read_csv("data/prison_population.csv") %>%
  as_tsibble(index = date, key = c(state, gender, legal, indigenous))

prison %>% 
  filter(state=="ACT", legal=="Sentenced", indigenous=="ATSI") %>%
  autoplot()
```
